SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.states

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.states.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseObjectiveState, ChooseStarterSideState, DrawCardState, EndGameState, PlaceCardState
public abstract class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class for implementing the State pattern in the handling of the main phases of the game.
See Also:

    protected String
    notYourTurnMessage
    Stores a message indicating that currently is not your turn, It'll be displayed if a player tries to do some action while it isn't his turn.

      The game instance

      Is a set with all the possible action that a player can do, they are listed in GameActionType.

      Stores a message indicating that currently is not your turn, It'll be displayed if a player tries to do some action while it isn't his turn.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      protected GameState(GameStateType type, Game game, Set<GameActionType> acceptableActionTypes)
      Constructor for the GameState class.
      Parameters:
      type - represents the GameStateType.
      game - object representing the Game.
      acceptableActionTypes - set containing the allowed actions, see GameActionType.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Is used to handle some tasks needed for the proper functioning of the state (es. drawing the common objectives).

    • execute

      public abstract void execute(GameAction action) throws InvalidActionException, NotYourTurnException
      Handles the main task of the State.
      Parameters:
      action - tells witch type of GameAction needs to be handled.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not supported by this state.
      NotYourTurnException - if the player making the action is not the current player.

    • goToNextState

      public void goToNextState(GameState nextState)
      Handles the process of switching to the state passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      nextState - the state to switch to.

    • checkActionValidity

      protected void checkActionValidity(GameAction action) throws InvalidActionException, NotYourTurnException
      Checks if the action requested by the player if valid in the current game state ad if not notifies the player.
      Parameters:
      action - that the player tries to perform.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is not supported by this state.
      NotYourTurnException - if the player making the action is not the current player.

    • isYourTurn

      protected boolean isYourTurn(GameAction action)
      Checks if the action is being performed by the current player.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the action is performed by the current player, false otherwise.

    • disconnectPlayer

      public abstract void disconnectPlayer(String username)
      Handles the disconnection of a player.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to be disconnected.

    • getType

      public GameStateType getType()
      Gets the type of the current game state.
      Returns:
      the type of the current game state.
